name: ∞RUSH
description:
A game made in less than 48 hours for GMTK 2020 Game jam. As the theme is out of control, you play with a character that is out of control, it is always moving in the direction it is facing. Your job is to guide the character to coins, avoid mines and avoid getting out of the grid by placing Directing blocks that rotate the character, thus changing his movement direction. Just take care to memorize the letters on your keyboard.

Credits:

Music:
Xeon theme remastered by bart: https://opengameart.org/content/xeon-theme-remastered
Coin sounds:https://opengameart.org/content/10-8bit-coin-sounds
Explosion sounds: https://opengameart.org/content/boom-pack-1

Art:
Keyboard pixel art by Gerald: https://gerald-burke.itch.io/geralds-keys
Coins, Player from Mini FX, Items & UI pack: https://grafxkid.itch.io/mini-fx-items-ui
